details.top: The Prophet (sal-Allaahu 'alayhe wa sallam) would place his right hand under his cheek when about to sleep and supplicate:
details.arabic_diacless: اللٰهم قني عذابك يوم تبعث عبادك
details.arabic: اَللّٰهُمَّ قِنِيْ عَذَابَكَ يَوْمَ تَبْعَثُ عِبَادَكَ
details.translations: O Allaah, protect me from Your punishment on the day Your servants are resurrected.'
